For this purpose, we have customer focus and customer perspective in our DNA. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are convinced that our open leadership style with space for creativity and individual development alongside with an undisguised view of the customer is a great base for this goal. Regular feedback cycles, salary reviews, promotion campaigns, engagement surveys and succession planning promote our constructive learn and grow culture. Regular townhall meetings, in person or virtual, together with a broadly available knowledge base and integration in global communities support an open and collaborative communication culture. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is an agile and flexible company both globally and locally offering a huge variety of continuous learning and development opportunities. As every employee, you can follow up a customized career and succession planning in our GROW portal with clearly defined competency frameworks. The LEARN platform offers a wide variety of trainings across topics in engineering, social collaboration or personal development. Open assessments provide a transparent perspective for your career development. Fairness is lived and breathed within EPAM. This is also reflected in the assessment process. A jury of experienced professionals examine the skills and propose an individualized development plan based on the published competency frameworks. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We tackle interesting projects with our clients in diverse cross-border teams and interdisciplinary networks competing with the top companies of the industry. Our global internal mobility team provides the full range of all inquiries and visa support, embassy appointments, travel and accommodation support if required.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We offer \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"flexible working times\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and, with regards to the individual life situation, the possibility of mobile work or work from home, operational requirements, especially client requirements come first. Depending on your activity, with us you can also enjoy the freedom of working from home.
